All functions

Continuous_Electrode

Definition for electrodes that collects continuous signals

LFP_electrode

Definition for electrodes that collects 'LFP' signals

RAVEAbstarctElectrode

Abstract definition of electrode class in RAVE

RAVERepository

Definition for data repository class

async_work()

Execute parallel job in another session

compare_context()

Internal function to compare contexts

loaded_rave_repository()

Create or get RAVERepository instance

RAVE Internal condition classes

Check States of Current RAVE instances or 'shiny' instances

Create 3D brain instance

rave_cache_path()

Temporary path where large cached data should be stored

Create S3 Generic Functions that Respects RAVE Context
